boardgame.name: 51. Stan: Master Set
51st State: Das Master-Set
51st State: Master Set
51st State: Set Completo
51st State: Set de jeu complet
boardgame.description: The world you know no longer exists. There is no government. No army. No civilization. The United States has collapsed, and now thirty years after the war started, new powers finally try to take control over the ruined country, try to establish a new order, try to control others and create a new country, a new state: the 51st State._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;51st State is a card game in which players control one of four powers trying to build a new country. Players put new locations into play, hire leaders, and send people to work in buildings to gain resources and new skills. To do this, every card in 51st State can be used in three different ways:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Raze a location to gain many resources once._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Deal with this location to gain one resource every turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Build the location so that you can use its skill each turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;51st State: Master Set marks the rebirth of the 51st State line, with this set containing 88 cards from the original base game, and 50 cards each from both the New Era and Winter expansions; one of these expansions can be mixed with the cards of the base game, but not both at the same time. The entire set has been rebalanced to offer a cohesive experience no matter which expansion you choose to use._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is the pre-order version, with: - Two extra factions: Hegemony and Texas. - Three Cities micro expansion (three tiles and six faction markers). - Six wooden faction discs with stickers, that are used instead of the printed scoring markers. - Custom wooden pieces changes into exclusive custom wooden pieces with 3d reliefs cut into them and some accents painted on. - Transfer sheet. A quick summary of all changes between 51st State and Masterset. - Printed story _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Signal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; set in Neuroshima_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s world. - Solo game variant. The exclusive wooden pieces are especially cool. Played twice. Flat rate shipping of $15 to anywhere in the U.S. Local pickup available in the D.C. area (20815). Any questions, just let me know!
Only to be sold to: RagallachMC

Hallo Zusammen, löse ein Teil meiner Sammlung auf, die nicht auf den Tisch gekommen sind, oder nur ein mal versucht wurden und von meiner Spielgruppe nicht aufgenommen wurden. Sind meistens neu nur geöffnet oder einmal gespielt. Nichtraucher Haushalt und die Spiele wurden in einem Regal gehalten ohne Sonneneinstrahlung. Bin Sammler, darum immer mit Vorsicht behandelt. Schaut euch meine anderen Angebote an! Versicherter Versand 6€, ab 100€ gebe ich gerne ein Rabatt, Verhandlungsbereit! Nur Überweisung, Danke! Zum Spiel: Ich liebe das Spiel, doch es kam auch auf deutsch raus, will die englische nicht mehr, 5 mal gespielt, Karten waren in Schutzhüllen. Neuwertiger Zusatand ohne Kratzer und Kitschen!
